comments:
I am using build F2.
Every time I have eclipse running and I load Reflection X, after about 2-3 
minutes eclipse begins to have major UI problems.  The mouse seems to fail.  I 
can't click on a class, a method, or switch between any of the packages.  If I 
wait long enough sometimes it seems that the UI will finally respond to the 
mouse click event but it can take 2-3 minutes.  The problem is very consistent, 
as it occurs every time that I use Reflection X

The only work about that I found is to reboot and don't use Reflection X.  I 
attached some stack traces from the /.metadata/.log
